summary: Frontend testing completed successfully for CalcAuto AiPro - Inventory scan modal functionality. All 5 test cases passed. Login works with provided credentials, navigation to Inventaire tab works, scan button (orange camera icon) opens modal, modal contains 'Prendre une photo' and 'Importer une image' options, and existing vehicle '2025 Ram 2500 Express 4x4' is displayed in inventory.

issues: Console warning: 'shadow*' style props are deprecated. Use 'boxShadow' - Minor styling deprecation warning
Console warning: 'props.pointerEvents is deprecated. Use style.pointerEvents' - Minor deprecation warning
Console warning: 'useNativeDriver' not supported - Expected for web platform, falls back to JS animation

seed_data_creation: No seed data created - used existing vehicle in inventory (2025 Ram 2500 Express 4x4 stock #46093)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend features for inventory scan modal are working. Login credentials verified. Inventory shows 1 vehicle (2025 Ram 2500 Express 4x4). The scan modal opens correctly with 'Prendre une photo' and 'Importer une image' options. Backend scan-and-save endpoint was not tested as this was frontend-only testing.
